original_title: Ang Bay Inga Wara Naman-an Kung Diin Halin
overview: Feeling lonely and isolated in a secluded home in the barrio, Pedring and Iska grapple with the reality of losing their only son to build his own family in the city. Until one day, in an effort to reconnect with him, a mysterious girl appears out of nowhere and intends to change the couple's life forever.
title: The Girl from Nowhere
